name: Water Vs. Fire(Android)
description:
Water Vs. Fire is a strategy-defense game where you control an army of water machines and soldiers against the evil minions of the mighty Firelord, an ancient primal representation of the fire.

Is a Grid-based game in the style of "Plants Vs. Zombies" but with several differences, for example the waves, the difficulty of the enemies etc...

Too much words... why not try it yourself?

  • Technical Stuff
  • Min. Android API v14 - v4.0 - "Ice Cream Sandwich"
  • 40 MB of free space, for the app and data. (same space on PC)
